name: Batumi Beach Camp
description: A popular beachfront camping spot with stunning views of the Black Sea.

name: Green Oasis Campground
description: A serene camping area surrounded by lush greenery and nature.

name: Sunset Bay Camping
description: Camp by the bay and enjoy beautiful sunsets over the water.

name: Mountain View Campsite
description: Get closer to nature with this campsite offering breathtaking mountain views.

name: Tusheti Wilderness Camp
description: Embark on an adventure in the remote and wild landscapes of Tusheti.

name: Gomis Mta Retreat
description: Find tranquility and solitude at the heart of the Gomis Mta region.
